data.title: Joe Don Baker Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Joe Don Baker on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Joe Don Baker including GoldenEye, Mud, and more.
data.text:
Prime of Life

Matt Dillon and Festus become targets for revenge when they try to straighten out two trouble-making sons of an ex-lawman.

The Reprisal

Doc Adams is in jeopardy when he is the only witness to a killing and the murderer becomes his patient.

The Miracle

An undercover agent is murdered while trying to intercept a huge heroin shipment in the Pacific Northwest, and the IMF team is called to take over and put the dealer and his chief executioner out of business.

Last American Casualty

William sets out to have a relaxing father-son weekend with Ben, but instead ends up having to take on two cases of alcoholism, with Ben in-toe. William's dad enlists him to help get his best friend Duren clean.
